DOC.brief_title: Treatment Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome Using Footwear
DOC.criteria: Male Female 18 45 year age . Have diagnose patellofemoral pain syndrome ( PFPS ) physician . Have nontraumatic unilateral and/or bilateral peripatellar retropatellar knee pain . Patellofemoral knee pain and/or activity . Inactivity patellofemoral pain and/or stiffness , especially sit knee hold flexed posture . Peripatellar tenderness Â± mild inferior patellar pole tenderness . Run least 15km per week . Are heeltoe runner ( opposed forefoot striker ) . Are currently , previously , participate form treatment knee pain . Significant articular periarticular effusion bursitis . Significant joint line tenderness . Intraarticular ligamentous instability . Patellar apprehension . Have undergone form knee surgery arthroscopy . Have neuromuscular , musculoskeletal cardiovascular condition
